snippet: Several travel agencies in China said Wednesday that foreigners were banned from traveling to the Tibet Autonomous Region, the Chinese name for central Tibet, for at least June.
abstract: Several travel agencies in China say that foreigners are banned from traveling to the Tibet Autonomous Region, the Chinese name for central Tibet, for at least June; foreigners were barred from Tibet from late February to early April, a period that coincided with the anniversary of large protests against Chinese rule.
lead_paragraph: Several travel agencies in China said Wednesday that foreigners were banned from traveling to the Tibet Autonomous Region, the Chinese name for central Tibet, for at least June.
